questions.question: Which process occurs during light-dependent reactions?
questions.explanation: Light-dependent reactions produce ATP and NADPH.

questions.question: Explain the Calvin cycle.
questions.correctAnswer: It fixes carbon dioxide into glucose using ATP and NADPH.

questions.question: Where does photosynthesis mainly occur?
questions.explanation: Photosynthesis occurs in the chloroplasts of plant cells.

questions.question: Which loop is used when the number of iterations is unknown?
questions.explanation: While loops run until a condition becomes false.

questions.question: In which year did World War II end?
Which directory enables App Router?
questions.explanation: Next.js App Router uses the app directory.
